creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop Facebook game app to increase online awareness of the brand.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: We created an interactive game where users race across Canada. Developing a custom, pseudo-3D game engine that served as a contest entry mechanism was the only way to fit the tight deadline. We packed it with custom illustrations and animations combined with clean and user friendly interface.

The game was played by a huge number of people and helped Petro Canada significantly increase their fan base across North America.
